body: who tf cares about a doujin’s mc anyways bahahahaha just nut you horny fucks

this is so dumb and chaotic that i really love it. seeing such a stupid degenerate character not only get a worse personality, yet also worse drawing skill pleases me a lot. add to that the fact that he draws better with his left hand the entire time makes for such a stupid plot twist that i couldn’t stop laughing. 3 volumes of pure lust and unmatched stupidity. this series is a gem and brings pure, clear joy.

as someone who nuts to a lot of ntr, this is a series i always go back to just to remind myself that life is good sometimes.
im used to read dumb plots .. but this is the first time i read 3 entire volume of them . if author is make a parody/sarcasm of his own work well im ok ..
Either im weird, or that this thing is so bad... The story was all jacked around and twists are happening for no reason and etcetera etcetera... Or that was the purpose from the beginning...
Hidemaru is amazing in milf works !
Annoying convicted  ass MC is not good. Mellow him out a bit. Good manga btw MC is still bad.
